newsitem.title: CANADA: Canada Q3 GDP price deflator rises.
newsitem.headline: Canada Q3 GDP price deflator rises.

text.p: Canada's implicit price index for calculation of gross domestic product at market prices rose 0.7 percent in the third quarter to 129.7 (base 1986) after a 0.5 pct rise in the second quarter, Statistics Canada said on Friday.
Economists surveyed by Reuters had forecast a rise of 0.3 percent in the third quarter.
